item.title: Bash
item.description: IF if [[ condition ]]; then commands fi IF-THEN-ELSE if [[ condition ]]; then commands 1 else commands 2 fi FOR for var in list do commands done WHILE while [ condition ] do commands done CASE case “$variable” in “$condition1” ) command… ;; “$condition2” ) command… ;; esac
